column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Yea I'm #1800 review and I'm telling you it rocked. Out of bounds rocked. Get the classic
column3: chow down. It pains me to say that as a born and raised Chicagoan who moved I was always a thin crust guy. Too much dough
column4: Malnati's is close enough for me to almost jump sides. Almost. This is as good as it gets for deep dish
column5: not too much and cooked perfectly throughout. We got a Giordano's on the northside
column6: c'mon Lou you have 25 locations in Chicagoland
column7: can't you move one down to Indy? Excellent pie
